page.title: 03Steetley Quarry
page.content: The{Steetley Quarry}is about 1 mile south of{Shireoaks.}The{Steetley {Company Limited}is an international organisation, operating in many countries. It is concerned with the production of high temperature {ceramics, mineral extraction}and processing and the manufacture and distribution of{chemicals, industrial and{electrical supplies.}Steetley produces 125,000 tonnes of basic and pitch bonded products per year. At Steetley there is a new continuous tunnel kiln designed to operate at up to 1900 C. There is a quality control laboratory where machines test how strong the {bricks}are. Steetly has for many years been a major supplier for refactories for use in the manufacture of all types of{portland}and{white cements.} {CONTINUED..
